values: 神经；勇气；胆量；魄力；精神力量；决心；坚定
鼓舞；激励；使振作；给予勇气；使有劲；使奋进；使坚强；增强信心

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 神经的；紧张不安的；强健有力的
有勇气的；易激动的；紧张不安的
神经质地；焦急地；提心吊胆地
大胆地；强壮地；神经过敏地
神经质；[心理] 神经过敏；紧张不安

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指在危险中表现出的无所畏惧精神或在逆境中仍能坚持下去的毅力。
普通用词。指面对危险或困难时无所畏惧的精神和敢于奋斗的进取心。
侧重指面临危险或在冒险的情况下具有冷静、清醒的头脑和坚定无畏的勇气。
指性格倔强，意志坚定，有骨气，有顽强的决心去做某事。

word_group.brief_definition: 神经性毒气；神经错乱性毒气

bilingual.source: The abducens nerve is the sixth cranial nerve.
bilingual.target: 展神经是第六对脑神经。

bilingual.source: The trochlear nerve is the fourth cranial nerve.
bilingual.target: 滑车神经是第四对脑神经。

bilingual.source: The accessory nerve is the eleventh cranial nerve.
bilingual.target: 副神经是第十一对颅神经。

bilingual.source: Tic douloureux is a very painful nerve disorder.
bilingual.target: 三叉神经痛是一种非常痛苦的神经疾病。
这次考试让他的神经崩溃了。

bilingual.source: The hypoglossal nerve is one of the twelve cranial nerves.
bilingual.target: 舌下的神经是十二对颅神经之一。

bilingual.source: Damaged nerve cells can lead to neurological diseases.
bilingual.target: 受损的神经元可能导致神经系统疾病。

bilingual.source: The autonomic nerve system includes the sympathetic and parasympathetic nerves.
bilingual.target: 自主神经系统包括交感神经和副交感神经。

bilingual.source: Damage to the neurilemma can lead to severe nerve damage.
bilingual.target: 神经鞘的损伤可能导致严重的神经损伤。
她的滑车神经受到了创伤。

list.abstract: 《大冒险》（Nerve）是一部由Henry Joost、Ariel Schulman执导，艾玛·罗伯茨、朱丽叶特·刘易斯、戴夫·弗兰科、乔尼·波查普、萨米拉·威利等主演的电影，于2016年7月27日在美国上映。

yingyinNormal.en: Tablets for nerve pain. Now, you can give him painkillers, if he asks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 神经止痛药片，如果他要吃，你可以给他止痛药。

yingyinNormal.en: Wait! My fault! I accidentally tweaked his facial nerve. And may have also stopped his heart.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，我的错，不小心扎到颜面神经，好像也把心给扎停了。

yingyinNormal.en: Actually, ethyl alcohol inhibits electrical conduction in the nerve cells and stimulates reuptake receptors of inhibitory neurotranmitters like gamma Aminobutyric acid.
yingyinNormal.zh: 事实上，酒精会抑制神经细胞的电传导，并会刺激感受器重新摄取抑制性神经递质，比如伽马氨基丁酸。

yingyinNormal.en: If life starts approximately a billion years ago we will have to wait four hundred thousand years to see the aberration of the first nerve cells.
yingyinNormal.zh: 生命出现在大约十亿年前,但还要再过四十万年，第一批神经细胞才会发生畸变。

yingyinNormal.en: I use electromagnetic waves to stimulate their olfactory nerve center. I speak to them. I can go anywhere, hear anything, and see everything.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我用电磁波刺激它们的嗅觉神经中枢，和它们讲话，我无所不在，眼观六路，耳听八方。

yingyinNormal.en: Good evening, Mr. Hunt. The weapons you recovered in Belarus were confirmed to be VX nerve gas, capable of devastating a major city.
yingyinNormal.zh: 晚上好，亨特先生，你从白俄罗斯带回的武器已经被确认是VX神经毒气，其威力足以摧毁一座大型城市。

yingyinNormal.en: When something really great happens in your life, say you fall in love, there is an increase in the release of serotonin from nerve cells, which ultimately stimulates your body and makes you feel happy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 比方说生命中某件大事发生了，例如谈恋爱神经细胞中的复合胺就会增加，进而刺激你的身体，让你感到快乐。

yingyinNormal.en: We were no match for his nerve attack. He's gotten stronger.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们对他的点穴功毫无招架之力，他功夫更高了。

yingyinNormal.en: You have got some nerve coming back here. I can't believe you never called me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你有种，还敢回来，你竟不打电话给我。

yingyinNormal.en: Which is another way of saying he doesn't have the nerve to compete. You scared?
yingyinNormal.zh: 意思也就是他没有胆量来较量。你害怕吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Did I pluck a nerve there? Oh, yeah. Okay. All right, everybody, it's time to eat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是不是踩到地雷了？对，好吧，好吧，大家，该吃饭了。

yingyinNormal.en: You see, I don't get a suit of armor. I'm exposed. Like a nerve. It's a nightmare.
yingyinNormal.zh: 算了吧 我可没有你的护甲，凭我这肉身就去玩命，别开玩笑了。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Secretary. You got some nerve. I'll give you that. You could use some of that right now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 国务卿先生。你好大胆。这我承认。你现在正需要点胆呢。

yingyinNormal.en: Unbelievable. You have some nerve showing up here just to schmooze with the tenure committee.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真是难以置信，你居然有脸跑这儿来找教职委员会的人闲聊。

yingyinNormal.en: Anyway, I don't wanna do it in front of someone with a tail. Hey, you swore you would nerve tell.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不想在有尾巴的人面前打。你发誓不说的。

yingyinNormal.en: An insurance policy, in case you lose your nerve, which you have. So now, if they take the lads, she will lead them straight back to you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一个保险措施，防止你临阵退缩，就是现在的这种情况。所以如果他们被捕，她就会让所有的矛头都只向你。

yingyinNormal.en: No, no, I keep trying, you know? I can get out, "Joey, I have too" but then I lose my nerve and I always finish with, "go to the bathroom." He may think I'm sick.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还没，我试了好几次，我只能说出“乔伊，我得…”然后就退缩，改说“去上厕所”，他可能以为我有病。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, I know what you're going to say. I made a commitment to Bernadette and to your family and I've got a hell of a lot of nerve coming in here and demanding that we postpone this thing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道你想说什么，我已对伯纳黛特和您家作出承诺，我鼓起万般勇气来到这里提出延期的要求实在是太过分了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 神经质的；神经紧张的；情绪不安的；与神经有关的；影响神经的；不安的；焦虑的；紧张造成的

word_family.mean: n. 神经；神经质；神经紧张；情绪不安；提心吊胆；精神力量；勇气；魄力；胆量；胆力；脉

examination_example.sentence: The human hand is an extremely dense network of <highlight>nerve</highlight> endings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人的手是一个极其密集的神经末梢网络。

sense_info_list.en: a person's steadiness, courage, and sense of purpose when facing a demanding situation

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指性格倔强, 意志坚定, 有骨气, 有顽强的决心去做某事。

侧重指面临危险或在冒险的情况下具有冷静、清醒的头脑和坚定无畏的勇气。

examination_example.sentence: I fell onto the stones, damaging a <highlight>nerve</highlight> in my hand, and Toby came over, helping me up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我摔倒在石头上，弄伤了手上的一根神经，Toby走过来，扶我起来。
